title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 207.9 - Licensed Managers as seconds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 207.9 - Licensed Managers as seconds

State Regulations
A licensed manager of a professional boxer or professional
mixed martial artist may act as second to such boxer or mixed martial artist in
any bout under the jurisdiction of the Commission, but, unless he or she shall
also be licensed by the Commission as a second of professional boxers or
professional mixed martial artists, he or she shall not be permitted to act as
second to any boxer or mixed martial artist with whom he shall have no
contractual relationship as manager. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
